body.p: Dear Sir -- Permit me to introduce to your favorable consideration Capt Oliver Palmer who goes to Louisville to see yourself & Gov. Robinson in relation to an appointment in the volunteer service. I have known him for a number of years he is truly loyal and will execute faithfully any trust reposed in him. He goes well recommended by Military men. Sir wishing speedy success to our cause I remain truly yours
